citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:36 PM on 30
March 2023. Inspector arrived at the facility around 1:36 PM, called the licensee and left a voicemail. The licensee
returned the call at 1:41 PM notifying the inspector that they were unavailable for inspection and no responsible adult was
available within the next 60 minutes.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:36 PM on 30 
March 2023. Inspector arrived at the facility around 1:36 PM, called the licensee and left a voicemail. The licensee 
returned the call at 1:41 PM notifying the inspector that they were unavailable for inspection and no responsible adult was 
available within the next 60 minutes. 
 
 
 
End Section
